color: silver, red, white, pink, black, blue, or purple
preset_modes: more  than 27 preset modes (e.g. portrait, backlighting, beach)
settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)
long_exposure: up to 25 seconds with starry sky mode

effects: 23 artistic effect modes (lighter or darker skin tones, vivid, soft focus, etc.)
ISO: up to 6400 ISO with little noise
